price: Sε Nokorε no redi wͻn apεdeε akyi a, nokorε sε, anka ͻsoro ne asaase ne deε εwͻ mu (nyinaa) bεsεe. Aane, Yεde wͻn afutusεm no aberε wͻn, nanso wͻtwe wͻn ho fri wͻn afutusεm no ho.
arabic: وَلَوِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلۡحَقُّ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡ لَفَسَدَتِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمَن فِيهِنَّۚ بَلۡ أَتَيۡنَٰهُم بِذِكۡرِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ عَن ذِكۡرِهِم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walawi ittabaʿa al-ḥaqu ahwāahum lafasadati al-samāwātu wal-arḍu waman fīhinna bal ataynāhum bidhik'rihim fahum ʿan dhik'rihim muʿ'riḍūna
